original_text: When they came back and told him, he said, “This is the word of the Lord, which he spoke by his servant Elijah the Tishbite: ‘In the territory of Jezreel the dogs shall eat the flesh of Jezebel,
korean_text: 돌아와서 전하니 예후가 이르되 이는 여호와께서 그 종 디셉 사람 엘리야를 통하여 말씀하신 바라 이르시기를 이스르엘 토지에서 개들이 이세벨의 살을 먹을지라

sentences.original_text: When they came back and told him,
This is the word of the Lord,
which he spoke by his servant Elijah the Tishbite:
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 종 디셉 사람 엘리야로 말씀하신 것이라:

sentences.original_text: the dogs shall eat the flesh of Jezebel,
